overview: Karah Maloley has 9 years of experience in mental health and social services. Karah has both clinical experience and administrative experience in mental health serving at-risk children, youth, and their families. Karah was promoted to Executive Director with Camelot Care Centers Inc. in Nebraska after serving as a Clinical Director for the treatment foster care program. Living abroad in Germany and Italy, Karah was a civil servant in the U.S. Army and worked as a contractor for the Veterans Affairs.
